verbs.description: handwritten 1923 letter from babe ruth to [V: boston] globe [ARG1: writer] up for auction a handwritten letter penned by legendary red sox and yankees slugger babe ruth after his 1923 mvp - winning season is up for auction this month ruth wrote the short letter for boston globe baseball writer james o’leary after ruth was voted the most valuable player in the american league according to a statement from the auction house dear mr o’leary the letter reads thank you for voting for me in the 1923 baseball contest i tried hard boston globe auction boston boston red sox writer babe ruth new york yankees james o’leary
